name: 99Seconds
description: The saga continues after 99Bullets. Now your problem isn't the number of bullets, rather the amount of time. 99Seconds, a fun, retro-style video game, where you can modify time to avoid all kinds of dangers. After finishing off Black Eye, V-99 entered a mysterious zone called Bit 8, without knowing why V-99 could modify time!. But everything became complicated with the appearance of the BLACK VECTORS: mysterious beings that aim to destroy any intruder who reaches Bit 8. - Online Ranking! - Control V-99, dodging, using SLOW DOWN to slow! - Arcade mobility like in the classic arcade games! - 60 Images per second in 1080p! - 5 Players in Arcade and Survival mode! - Retro-style levels! - Incredible enemy patterns! - Off-TV
